meanings.sent1: I love to eat fresh vegies from the garden.
meanings.sent2: My mom always cooks a variety of vegies for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the salad dressing!
meanings.sent4: The vegies in the market were like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy vegies added a burst of flavor to the dish.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'vegetables'
meanings.sent1: Let's grab some vegies for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bunch of different vegies for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cucumber break up with the carrot? It couldn't find the right dill!
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret ingredient was a mix of fresh vegies.
meanings.sent5: The colorful vegies made the plate look like a work of art.
